description: Triangular array T given by rows: T(n,0)=1 for n >= 0, T(1,1)=2; for even n >= 2, T(n,k)=T(n-2,k-1)+T(n-1,k-1)+T(n-1,k) for 1<=(odd k)<=n-1 and T(n,k)=T(n-1,k-1)+T(n-1,k) for 2<=(even k)<=n-2, T(n,n)=T(n-1,n-1); for odd n<=3, T(n,k)=T(n,k-1)+T(n-1,k-1)+T(n-1,k) for 1<=(odd k)<=n-2 and T(n,k)=T(n-1,k-1)+T(n-1,k) for 2<=(even k)<=n-1, T(n,n)=T(n-1,n-1)+T(n,n-1).
